Authors POST /authors with valid author params creates a new author
Authors POST /authors with valid author params returns the author data
Authors POST /authors with valid author params returns a status code of 201 (created)

examples.description: does not create a new author
examples.full_description: Authors POST /authors with invalid author params does not create a new author
Authors POST /authors with invalid author params returns the error messages

examples.description: returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)

Posts PATCH /posts/:id with valid post params updates a post
Posts PATCH /posts/:id with valid post params returns the post data
Posts PATCH /posts/:id with valid post params returns a status code of 200 (ok)
Posts PATCH /posts/:id with invalid author params does not update the post
Posts PATCH /posts/:id with invalid author params returns the error messages
